title: Review of FAA’s Establishment of a Pilot Records Database
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > Review of FAA’s Establishment of a Pilot Records Database Text Size: Review of FAA’s Establishment of a Pilot Records Database https://www.oig.dot.gov/sites/default/files/FAA%20Pilot%20Records%20Database%20Progress%20Final%20Report%5E8-20-15.pdf 173143 Review of FAA’s Establishment of a Pilot Records Database The U.S. Department of Transportation’s Office of Inspector General has released a report that evaluates the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration’s (FAA’s) progress in implementing the Pilot Records Database and determines the pilot records that are available for air carriers to review for new applicants.   9/9/2015
